title: African music: old and new
brief_description: An introduction to traditional African musical instruments such as flutes, rattles, drums and the Mbira. A modern concert is seen, which shows two African musicians using the traditional instruments with modern ones. These include amplified African drums, electric guitar, a wired Mbira and flutes.
